attributes.action: Stop the use of sexist stereotypes in advertisements.
attributes.additional_details: It is 2012, and yet for cleaning products, weekly shopping adverts, and even fast food adverts use negative and sexist stereotypes of women in their advertisements. It is setting a terrible example to young boys and girls about the role of women in society. There is a zero tolerance stance on racism in adverts, and now it's time for a zero tolerance stance on sexism in adverts. Please ensure the Advertising Standards Agency has the powers necessary to ban or regulate these adverts.
